author: niallp
msg: Port to 1_1_2_BRANCH: Few minor corrections to the ant build.xml
- change the release directory name from 'm-target' to 'dist' as it was confusing
- use the properties for the build/dist/release homes to exclude from the release, otherwise if they're hard-coded and someone changes them these directories are included in the source distro.

author: chrisg
msg: version number update for first preview release

author: niallp
msg: Bug #31094 Modify maven build to include the DTD's and xdocs - reported by Fernando Nasser

author: niallp
msg: Few minor corrections to the ant build.xml
- change the release directory name from 'm-target' to 'dist' as it was confusing
- use the properties for the build/dist/release homes to exclude from the release, otherwise if they're hard-coded and someone changes them these directories are included in the source distro.
